metadata.title: CVE-2023-52671 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix hang/underflow when transitioning to ODM4:1[Why]Under some circumstances, disabling an OPTC and attempting to reclaimits OPP(s) for a different OPTC could cause a hang/underflow due to OPPsnot being properly disconnected from the disabled OPTC.[How]Ensure that all OPPs are unassigned from an OPTC when it gets disabled.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
